Title: Ajax Sprite Toolkit
Description: The Ajax Sprite Toolkit is a collection of ASP.NET AJAX Controls and Behaviors that aid in the development of 2D sprite based games that run in a web browser.
HomeWiki:
Overview

The Ajax Sprite Toolkit is a collection of ASP.NET AJAX Controls and Behaviors that aid in the development of 2D sprite based games that run in a web browser.

These controls include:
  • GameWindow - used to display and track sprites by extending a container control such as a Panel.
  • Sprite - allows frame-based image animation and collision detection.
  • Sound - allows simultaneous playback of multiple sound files.

Getting Started

  • Check out these demos and tutorials (also included in the Release zip).
  • Fish Game - a simple fish game showing sprite animation, collision, and sound. http://andybeaulieu.com/FishGame.aspx
  • Getting Started Tutorial - gives a quick overview of what to do. http://andybeaulieu.com/TutorialGettingStarted.aspx
  • Sprite Tutorial - explains how sprite images are defined and animated. http://andybeaulieu.com/TutorialDefineSprites.aspx
  • Sound Tutorial - shows how to use mixed sound. http://andybeaulieu.com/TutorialPlayingSounds.aspx


Contribute

If you are a developer interested in contributing to this project, please contact andy@beaulieu.com
